common.title: How can I get involved with Open Sacramento?
common.text: Getting involved is easy! You can join their vibrant community by attending their events, meetups, and workshops. Whether you're an experienced coder or someone eager to learn, there's a place for you to contribute your skills and passion to create positive change in the community. For detailed directions on how to get started, please refer to our 'Get Started' page.
